https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/hC3NSqb2dwypTaZLQU2HxJUQuwE.jpg A feature documentary on African American ballerina Misty Copeland that examines her prodigious rise, her potentially career ending injury alongside themes of race and body image in the elite ballet world. A Ballerina's Tale
